 
<div component-loaded dib-container="timeZoneGrid" dib-grid  dib-config="{ }" >
	<div dib-inject-content="replace" layout="row"  aria-label="toolbar" can-be-moved=true can-have-children=true on-move-refresh-preview=true flex layout-xs='column' style="    " id='ci185105' aria-label="toolbar" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >

		<span flex=auto aria-label="emptyspan" can-be-moved=true flex=none style="    " id='ci185108' aria-label="emptyspan" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
		</span>
		<md-button aria-label="btnfilteropen" can-be-moved=true flex=none class="md-icon-button md-squared md-raised" style="    " ng-click="showSearch = !showSearch"  id='ci185113' aria-label="btnfilteropen" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
			<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
				Display headers for filtering records
			</md-tooltip>
			<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibGlobals/images/svg/search.svg">

			<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
				Apply filter criteria specified in grid headers
			</md-tooltip>

			<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
				Show all records and clear filter criteria
			</md-tooltip>

		</md-button>
		<div aria-label="gridtotals" can-be-moved=true flex=none layout="row" style="    " id='ci185114' aria-label="gridtotals" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" ng-if="page.fromRecord >
			-1" >
			<md-button ng-disabled="true" aria-label="Grid totals">
				Records: {{page.fromRecord}}
				<span ng-if='page.fromRecord>
					0'>
					to {{page.toRecord}} of {{page.records}}
				</span>
				<span ng-if='page.totalRecords!=page.records'>
					(Total: {{page.totalRecords}})
				</span>
			</md-button>
		</div>

									</md-icon>
									<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-src="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAngular/src/img/icons/up.svg"  ng-if="gridOptions.sortFields['Time_zone_id']['Order'] == 'DESC'">
									</md-icon>
								</span>
							</div>
							<span ng-if="showSearch" dib-edit>
								<md-input-container aria-label="Time_zone_id" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4056&text=time_zone' >
									<input type="text"  name="Time_zone_id" ng-model="search.Time_zone_id" aria-label="Time Zone" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185664' aria-label="Time_zone_id" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >

									</label>

							</span>
						</div>
						<div table-column  flex  class="md-subhead" dib-column-heading='185665' style="    " >

									<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-src="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAngular/src/img/icons/up.svg"  ng-if="gridOptions.sortFields['Use_leap_seconds']['Order'] == 'DESC'">
									</md-icon>
								</span>
							</div>
							<span ng-if="showSearch" dib-edit>

									<input type="text"  maxlength='255' name="Use_leap_seconds" ng-model="search.Use_leap_seconds" aria-label="Use Leap Seconds" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185665' aria-label="Use_leap_seconds" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >
									<label>
										Use Leap Seconds
									</label>
									<div ng-messages="timeZoneGrid.Use_leap_seconds.$error">
										<div ng-message="maxlength">
											At most 255 characters are allowed.
										</div>
									</div>
								</md-input-container>
							</span>
						</div>
					</div>
				</md-list-item>
				<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy dib-inline-edit  first-record-padding inline-add" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' ng-if="gridOptions.inlineAddShow">
					<ng-form name=timeZoneGrid  dib-container-name="timeZoneGrid" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit='add-mode'  layout-align="start start" ng-enter='addRow($event,row)'>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex = 'nogrow' dib-column="185116" style="    " >

									View/edit record in a form

									</span>

										<input type="number"  ng-disabled="true" required         name="Time_zone_id" ng-model="model.Time_zone_id" aria-label="Time Zone" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185664' aria-label="Time_zone_id" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-number' md-detect-hidden >
										<label>
											Time Zone*

							</div>

											{{$parent.viewModel['Use_leap_seconds']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>

										<md-input-container flex>
											<label>
												Use Leap Seconds
											</label>
											<md-select    ng-required=true         ng-disabled="model._GET['Use_leap_seconds'][recordStatus]" dib-data-component='enum' dib-onload-service placeholder="Use Leap Seconds" aria-label="Use_leap_seconds" md-on-close="select185665(model)" flex ng-model="model.Use_leap_seconds" name='Use_leap_seconds' id='ci185665' aria-label="Use_leap_seconds" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
												<md-option ng-repeat="state in ['Y','N']" value="{{state}}"  >
													{{state}} 
												</md-option>
											</md-select>

												<div ng-message="required">
													Use Leap Seconds required.
												</div>
											</div>
										</md-input-container>
									</div>
								</span>
							</div>

								Use selected data

						</div>
					</ng-form>
				</md-list-item>

		</div>
		<md-content  fill-height footer-element='.dib-grid-footer' class='dib-grid-column-content'>

					<div class="no-records-available">
						  No records available 
					</div>
				</md-list-item>
				<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy " ng-repeat="row in gridData"  ng-class="{ 'md-custom-accent' : row.___selected, 'first-record-padding' : $index==0 && row.___editing }" ng-click="selectRow(row, $event)"   double-click="rowEdit(element)" >
					<ng-form name='timeZoneGrid' dib-container-name="timeZoneGrid" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit="closed" layout-align="start start" ng-enter='saveRow($event,row)' >

							<md-button aria-label="btngridedit" can-be-moved=true flex="nogrow" class="md-icon-button  md-squared md-raised" style="    " id='ci185116' aria-label="btngridedit" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' ng-click="common.goTo('timeZoneForm','',true,'?primary_Time_zone_id='+row.Time_zone_id,'',$event);" dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >

									View/edit record in a form

										<input type="number"  ng-disabled="true" required         name="Time_zone_id" ng-model="model.Time_zone_id" aria-label="Time Zone" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185664' aria-label="Time_zone_id" dib-container-name='timeZoneGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-number' md-detect-hidden >

											Time Zone*
										</label>

												<md-option ng-repeat="state in ['Y','N']" value="{{state}}"  >
													{{state}} 
												</md-option>
											</md-select>
											<div ng-messages="timeZoneGrid.Use_leap_seconds.$error">
												<div ng-message="required">
													Use Leap Seconds required.
												</div>
											</div>
										</md-input-container>
									</div>
								</span>
							</div>

							</md-button>

						</div>
					</ng-form>
				</md-list-item>
			</md-list>
		</md-content>
		<div layout-fill layout='row' flex class='dib-grid-footer'>
			<div flex=20 layout='row'>
				<md-button disabled>
					Page limit
				</md-button>
				<md-select ng-model="page.limit">
					<md-option ng-value="10">
						10
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="20">
						20
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="50">
						50
					</md-option>
				</md-select>
			</div>
			<div  ng-if="page.count>
				1" flex=80 layout='row'  layout-align="center center" >
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='firstPage()'>
					First 
				</md-button>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='previousPage()'>
					Prev 
				</md-button>
				<div layout='row'>
					<md-button disabled>
						Page
					</md-button>
					<md-input-container>
						<input type='number' ng-model="page.number" aria-label="Page number">
					</md-input-container>
					<md-button disabled>
						of {{ page.count }} 
					</md-button>
				</div>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
					Next 
				</md-button>
				<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
					Last 
				</md-button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
